string.text: A voice from the north has called for me. I should try to find the source.
The voice calling me must be from the Wish Granter. I should be able to find it somewhere in the sarcophagus.
Find the hidden Monolith base mentioned in the manuscript and discover what it is hiding.
Destroy the Wish Granter: Defeat all 10 waves of projections conjured by the Wish Granter.
Disable the C-Consciousness pods' power supply generators.
